data.comment: The big names in today's match at Goodison Park have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Grady Diangana of West Bromwich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In Liverpool, Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at Goodison Park.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
West Bromwich's Jake Livermore misses with an attempt on goal.
Everton have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Everton in the half of West Bromwich.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Goal! West Bromwich have got their heads in front thanks to a Grady Diangana strike.
In the minute 10, Matheus Pereira with an assist there.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Richarlison of Everton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 11, Mike Dean awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Everton.
Can Everton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 16, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Abdoulaye Doucoure (Everton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 17, Everton pushes forward through Allan, whose finish on goal is saved.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
West Bromwich's Callum Robinson gets in a shot on goal at Goodison Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Everton.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
West Bromwich are on the attack at Goodison Park, where Jake Livermore is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 23, West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Everton are coming forward and Richarlison gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for West Bromwich at Goodison Park.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Everton, close to West Bromwich's area.
In the minute 28, Important block from the West Bromwich defence as Richarlison fires in a strike for Everton.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Throw-in high up the field for Everton in Liverpool.
In the minute 29, Everton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Everton's Michael Keane attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Mike Dean awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Dominic Calvert-Lewin grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Goodison Park.
In Liverpool West Bromwich drive forward through Matheus Pereira. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Everton in the half of West Bromwich.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 41, Mike Dean signals a Everton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 44, Everton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
At Goodison Park the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Everton.
The first-half is over.
James Rodriguez is on target to give Everton a 2-1 advantage.
West Bromwich are down to 10 men after Kieran Gibbs has been shown a red card.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Everton.
Goal! Matheus Pereira levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 52, West Bromwich have a dangerous throw-in.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
In the minute 53, Can Everton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Everton drives forward and Richarlison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Michael Keane puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
In the minute 55, Mike Dean signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Everton have a goal kick.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 58, Everton needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Dominic Calvert-Lewin puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-2.
Great play from Richarlison to set up the goal.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In the minute 65, Free kick Everton.
Gylfi Sigurdsson is replacing Abdoulaye Doucoure for Everton at Goodison Park.
Lucas Digne (Everton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Everton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Goal! Everton increase their lead to 5-2 through a well-placed header from Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
That's a fine assist from James Rodriguez.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mike Dean signals a Everton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Slaven Bilic is making the team's first substitution at Goodison Park with Matt Phillips replacing Matheus Pereira.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Grady Diangana with Kyle Edwards.
Carlo Ancelotti (Everton) is making a second substitution, with Alex Iwobi replacing Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 75, Sam Field is replacing Romaine Sawyers for the away team.
Everton's Richarlison has run offside.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
In the minute 78, Everton make their third substitution with Moise Kean replacing James Rodriguez.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Everton are pushing forward but Moise Kean's finish is wide of the goal.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Callum Robinson for West Bromwich is whistled offside.
In the minute 86, Throw-in West Bromwich.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Everton attack but Richarlison's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 89, Mike Dean awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Goodison Park. The final score is 5-2.
